languages.text: "Если Лилэтан останется на нашем попечении, я готов на подобную сделку. Мы больше не потеряем ни одного собрата и сможем позаботиться о мире, который столько лет пребывал в страданиях под игом человека. Что же касается повелительницы мон-кай..." {n}Муаран делает необычный жест рукой — и эльдары за его спиной срываются с места, убегая в лес.{/n} "Мы поможем тебе".

traits.locale_text: "Если Лилэтан останется на нашем попечании, я готов на подобную сделку. Мы больше не потеряем ни одного собрата и сможем позаботиться о мире, который столько лет пребывал в страданиях под игом человека. Что же касается повелительницы мон-кай..." {n}Муаран делает необычный жест рукой — и эльдары за его спиной срываются с места, убегая в лес.{/n} "Мы поможем тебе".

languages.text: "If the Lilaethan remains in our charge, I am willing to come to an agreement. We will not lose another kinsman and we will be able to tend to this world, which has suffered so many years under Humanity's yoke. As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."
languages.original_text: "Если Лилэтан останется на нашем попечении, я готов на подобную сделку. Мы больше не потеряем ни одного собрата и сможем позаботиться о мире, который столько лет пребывал в страданиях под игом человека. Что же касается повелительницы мон-кай..." {n}Муаран делает необычный жест рукой — и эльдары за его спиной срываются с места, убегая в лес.{/n} "Мы поможем тебе".

As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

"If the Lilaethan remains in our charge, I am willing to come to an agreement. We will not lose another kinsman and we will be able to tend to this world, which has suffered so many years under Humanity's yoke. As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

"If the Lilaethan remains in our charge, I am willing to come to an agreement. We will not lose another kinsman and we will be able to tend to this world, which has suffered so many years under Humanity's yoke. As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

languages.text: “如果莉莱赞能继续由我们管理，我愿意与你达成协议。这个世界已经在人类的枷锁之下承受了太久痛苦，我们会照顾好这个世界，我们也不愿再失去任何一位族人。至于那个执政的猴子……”{n}穆兰比了个古怪的手势，他身后的艾达灵族立刻跑进了森林。{/n}“我们会帮你解决的。”
languages.original_text: "If the Lilaethan remains in our charge, I am willing to come to an agreement. We will not lose another kinsman and we will be able to tend to this world, which has suffered so many years under Humanity's yoke. As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

traits.locale_text: “如果莉莱赞能继续由我们管理，我愿意与你达成协议。这个世界已经在人类的枷锁之下承受了太久痛苦，我们会照顾好这个世界，我们也不愿再失去任何一位族人。至于那个执政的猴子……”{n}穆兰比了个古怪的手势，他身后的艾达灵族立刻跑进了森林。{/n}“我们会帮你解决的。”

languages.text: «Si el Lilaethan sigue en nuestro poder, estoy dispuesto a llegar a un acuerdo. No perderemos a nadie más de nuestro pueblo y podremos cuidar de este mundo que tanto ha sufrido bajo el yugo de la Humanidad. En cuando a{mf|l| la} mon-keigh gobernante...». {n}Muaran hace un gesto extraño y los Aeldari que tiene detrás escapan corriendo al bosque.{/n} «Le ayudaremos».
languages.original_text: "If the Lilaethan remains in our charge, I am willing to come to an agreement. We will not lose another kinsman and we will be able to tend to this world, which has suffered so many years under Humanity's yoke. As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

traits.locale_text: «Si el Lilaethan sigue en nuestro poder, estoy dispuesto a llegar a un acuerdo. No perderemos a nadie más de nuestro pueblo y podremos cuidar de este mundo que tanto ha sufrido bajo el yugo de la Humanidad. En cuando a{mf|l| la} mon-keigh gobernante...». {n}Muaran hace un gesto extraño y los Aeldari que tiene detrás escapan corriendo al bosque.{/n} «Le ayudaremos».

languages.text: 「リラエタンがこのまま我らの保護下におかれるのなら同意しよう。我々はこれ以上同胞を失うつもりはない。そして、この星を癒やすこともできる。何年も人類の重圧に苦しんできたこの星を。モン＝ケイの支配については…」{n}ムアランが不思議な合図を出すと、ムアランの後ろに控えていたアエルダリが森の中へと走り去る。{/n}「お前に手を貸そう」
languages.original_text: "If the Lilaethan remains in our charge, I am willing to come to an agreement. We will not lose another kinsman and we will be able to tend to this world, which has suffered so many years under Humanity's yoke. As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

traits.locale_text: 「リラエタンがこのまま我らの保護下におかれるのなら同意しよう。我々はこれ以上同胞を失うつもりはない。そして、この星を癒やすこともできる。何年も人類の重圧に苦しんできたこの星を。モン＝ケイの支配については…」{n}ムアランが不思議な合図を出すと、ムアランの後ろに控えていたアエルダリが森の中へと走り去る。{/n}「お前に手を貸そう」

languages.text: "Wenn Lileath uns weiterhin untersteht, bin ich bereit für eine Abmachung. Wir werden keinen weiteren Volksgenossen verlieren und uns um diese Welt kümmern können, die so viele Jahre unter dem Joch der Menschheit gelitten hat. Was die herrschenden Chem-Pan-Sey angeht ..." {n}Muaran macht eine seltsame Geste, und die Aeldari hinter ihm rennen in den Wald.{/n} "Wir werden Euch helfen."
languages.original_text: "If the Lilaethan remains in our charge, I am willing to come to an agreement. We will not lose another kinsman and we will be able to tend to this world, which has suffered so many years under Humanity's yoke. As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Lileath uns weiterhin untersteht, bin ich bereit für eine Abmachung. Wir werden keinen weiteren Volksgenossen verlieren und uns um diese Welt kümmern können, die so viele Jahre unter dem Joch der Menschheit gelitten hat. Was die herrschenden Chem-Pan-Sey angeht ..." {n}Muaran macht eine seltsame Geste, und die Aeldari hinter ihm rennen in den Wald.{/n} "Wir werden Euch helfen."

languages.text: « Je veux bien conclure un accord, à condition que la lilaethan reste sous notre responsabilité. Ainsi, nous ne perdrons plus aucun des nôtres et nous saurons prendre soin de ce monde qui a tant souffert sous le joug de l'humanité. Quant à la mon-keigh au pouvoir... » {n}Muaran fait un geste étrange, puis les Aeldaris qui se tenaient derrière lui partent en courant dans la forêt.{/n} « Nous vous aiderons. »
languages.original_text: "If the Lilaethan remains in our charge, I am willing to come to an agreement. We will not lose another kinsman and we will be able to tend to this world, which has suffered so many years under Humanity's yoke. As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

traits.locale_text: « Je veux bien conclure un accord, à condition que la lilaethan reste sous notre responsabilité. Ainsi, nous ne perdrons plus aucun des nôtres et nous saurons prendre soin de ce monde qui a tant souffert sous le joug de l'humanité. Quant à la mon-keigh au pouvoir... » {n}Muaran fait un geste étrange, puis les Aeldaris qui se tenaient derrière lui partent en courant dans la forêt.{/n} « Nous vous aiderons. »

languages.text: "Lilaethan'ın başında biz kalacaksak anlaşmaya razıyım. Başka hiçbir soydaşımızı yitirmeyecek, yıllardır İnsanlığın boyunduruğunda eziyet çeken bu dünyaya hizmet edeceğiz. Başa geçecek mon-keigh konusuna gelecek olursak..." {n}Muaran tuhaf bir hareket yapıyor ve bunun üzerine arkasındaki Aeldariler, ormana doğru koşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sana yardım edeceğiz."
languages.original_text: "If the Lilaethan remains in our charge, I am willing to come to an agreement. We will not lose another kinsman and we will be able to tend to this world, which has suffered so many years under Humanity's yoke. As regards the ruling mon-keigh..." {n}Muaran makes a strange gesture, and the Aeldari behind him take off running into the forest.{/n} "We will help you."

Başa geçecek mon-keigh konusuna gelecek olursak..." {n}Muaran tuhaf bir hareket yapıyor ve bunun üzerine arkasındaki Aeldariler, ormana doğru koşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sana yardım edeceğiz."
